DOC.brief_summary: This study is to investigate clinical utility of beta2 microglobulin as an early marker for renal dysfunction caused by Tenofovir in Vietnamese HIV-infected patients.
DOC.brief_title: Utility of Urinary beta2 Microglobulin as an Early Marker of Renal Dysfunction in Vietnamese HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.detailed_description: An observational study to investigate clinical utility of beta2 microglobulin as an early marker for renal dysfunction caused by Tenofovir in Vietnamese HIV-infected patients.
DOC.criteria: HIVinfected patients in the NHTD ACC cohort who are under cART or will start cART and can provide written informed consents. HIVinfected patients who drop out of treatment within 6 months from the entry.
